questions.question: I .......................... the bell twice but no one opened the door.
questions.description: Rang is the past tense of ring.

questions.question: Have you ............................ your violin?
questions.description: Brought is the past tense of bring.

questions.question: Your cat has ........................... all the milk.
questions.description: Drunk is the past participle form of drink. We use the past participle after drink.

questions.question: She ................................ the clothes dry.
questions.description: Wrung is the past tense of wring.

questions.question: They ............................... a deep well.
questions.description: Dug is the past tense of dig.

questions.question: I ............................... the whole day in bed.
questions.description: Spent is the past tense of spend.

questions.question: The place ............................. of damp.
questions.description: The past tense of smell can be smelled or smelt.

questions.question: She ................................ like a star at the party.
questions.description: Shone is the past tense of shine.

questions.question: I .............................. some juice on the carpet.
questions.description: The past tense of spill is spilled or spilt.

questions.question: Suddenly a brilliant idea ................................. me.
questions.description: Struck is the past tense of strike.

questions.question: He was wearing a ................................ shirt.
questions.description: Torn is the past tense of tear.

questions.question: I .............................. up hearing a noise.
questions.description: Woke is the past tense of wake.
